recommendations: Use permutation importance as the primary feature ranking method
Compare feature importance across multiple models for robustness
Focus on features that are consistently important across models
For linear models: analyze coefficient signs and magnitudes
Consider feature scaling for better coefficient interpretation
For tree models: use built-in feature importance alongside permutation importance
Consider feature interaction effects in tree-based models
Use partial dependence plots to understand feature-target relationships
Look for non-linear relationships in partial dependence plots
Investigate highly correlated features for potential redundancy
Consider feature engineering based on correlation patterns
